name: BB-VWAP Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reversion strategy for large-cap U.S. equities that buys when price is stretched below the lower Bollinger Band yet still supported by VWAP, and sells/shorts when price is stretched above the upper Bollinger Band but below VWAP. Uses daily bars, exits at mid-band or after 5 days, with 3 % stop and 4 % take-profit. Allocates 2 % of equity per position via fixed-fraction sizing.
